name: POWER_TRANSFORMER
description:
Native application versions of the BOX2D physics-based video game POWER TRANSFORMER are provided for MacOSx, Windows64, Windows32, and LINUX.

Multiple US cities have been hit with simultaneous power grid failures. We are RUNNING OUT OF POWER (Ludum Dare 39 theme). The government has tasked YOU—a PowerTransformer—to restore as many windmills as you can in a limited amount of time to get power restored to a maximum number of households. 

This physics-based game was developed using Java, Processing, and BOX2D. Thank you for playing this game.
